website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive pot rack for small spaces.
pros: Comes with a lot of hooks
Compact size at slightly less than 2 feet
If wall mounted, lids can store on top of the rack
Can be mounted on the wall, ceiling, or under the cabinet
Strong enough to handle cast iron
cons: Rack does not sit far out from the wall on a wall mount
Your pots and pans will likely lean against the wall

customer_reviews.title: Free up the cabinets - looks good - strong enough to hold cast iron
customer_reviews.text: I just opened up a large amount of storage by mounting 3 of these in my kitchen. I have not only my pots hanging now but 4 CAST IRON skillets that are very heavy and this thing handles them well. I really need a kitchen remodel but until then this has bought me some additional space that was sorely needed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I needed to free up drawer space in our new home. We installed the rods in our pantry on the wall behind the door as it was the perfect size. Getting the metal molly bolts into the wall was tough because of where the studs and metal corner pieces behind the drywall. That said I am confident these will hold the weight of the pans. I like the industrial look of them
customer_reviews.author: florence baird

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pot rack for storage but needed something small that could hang underneath the kitchen cabinets. This is shown as a wall mount but it works just fine as an under cabinet rack also. The only downside is the hooks aren't quite big enough for most of my pots but we were able to use pliers to bend the hooks out a bit so the hook would fit in the hole of the pot handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rootfield

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks classy
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my kitchen to hold kitchen shears/strainers. I like that hooks are small enough to fit utensils that may have smaller hanging holes . Looks super classy and could probably hold much heavier stuff.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Got the delivery earlier than expected, everything in good shape with all parts and pieces wrapped securely in box. Was surprised it came with heavy screw in anchors as well as the plastic ones. Was able to screw one side into the studs and used the screw in anchors for the other side. Have 4 or 5 fairly heavy cast iron pans hanging from it and it's very sturdy. Overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on the wall. These are great in my mom's small apartment. Freed up a bottom cabinet for her to use for other kitchen items.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Harney

customer_reviews.title: Definite space saver
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and serves its purpose. I did think that it would stick away from the wall more, but it still helps with space saving.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pesce

customer_reviews.title: Great for small apartments
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in the small space we had in our NYC apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom. She loved it. It was easy to install and feels really sturdy. She loves seeing her pots and pans hanging in her kitchen now!
customer_reviews.author: DrMartin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping utensils within reach while cooking
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping utensils within reach while cooking. Each hook is large enough to hang 2 or 3 spoons, whisks, spatulas or sets of measuring cups.Great price. Easy to install. Looks nice! Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kane

customer_reviews.title: I don't like my necklaces to get tangled so this works really ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this as a necklace holder. I don't like my necklaces to get tangled so this works really great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fits my needs. Small enough to fit my very small kitchen, yet big enough to hold my pots and pans. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon C

customer_reviews.title: I loved this pot/pan holder
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pot/pan holder. I wanted it to be out of the way, not bulky & it is just perfect for my small space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! It helps storing pans for my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Finish on the bar needed a little work ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Finish on the bar needed a little work to match other 'brushed finish' items and the fixing screws supplied were too short, but this was easily remedied.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Simple design thats sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice with our other stainless kitchen equipment. Sturdy, holds a decent amount of utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my kitchen all my spoons are close by now
customer_reviews.author: Hamza Khan

customer_reviews.title: Durable, functional, attractive
customer_reviews.text: A durable, attractive stainless steel rack with heavy-gauge stainless support brackets. All necessary mounting hardware is included. The "white paint" alluded to by one reviewer on the brackets is actually a removable protective film for the stainless finish. A good, versatile value.
customer_reviews.author: Jayke

customer_reviews.title: Great hanger for cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Bought 2 to by my new set of stainless steel cookware with lids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they are good quality and I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I will hang them, but they are good quality and I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: topshop

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to hang and it holds several pans at once.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: It works I like it. Just a bit short to fit as ...
customer_reviews.text: It works I like it. Just a bit short to fit as much as I would've liked to. Looks like the ikea ones. Love the look, and very durable
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: easy install and served purposes intended for
customer_reviews.text: Item as expected, easy install and served purposes intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H

customer_reviews.title: Returned it!
customer_reviews.text: The bar looked in perfect addition but the brackets weren't finished properly. The part that faced the wall was stainless and the part you could see was unfinished. I didn't even get to the install part. Just saw the brackets and packed it back up to return.
customer_reviews.author: michie

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with my order
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with my order. I did not receive the hardware (screws or allen wrench) to assemble or install my pot rack. If I had received all of the parts it might have been a nice pot rack. I was forced to give it a one star to get my review posted.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hutsell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: These look great, are accurately described in terms of size, and are strong. I hang cast iron skillets from them. Well constructed and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: johninde

customer_reviews.title: Nearly identical to the IKEA rack that's now impossible to find
customer_reviews.text: Needed another rack like my IKEA one and this was the closest I could find online. The only difference is chrome instead of brushed nickel on the bar portion. Not a huge deal for me, works perfectly as a rack above our sink in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: intangiblereverie

customer_reviews.title: Wise purchase on my part.  I took a chance and love the results.
customer_reviews.text: To save space in my small home, after moving from a larger home and purging a lot of "stuff" -- I find this purchase is an immense space saver. The convenience is incredible. Everything is at my fingertips. We now have 3 of these wall organizers and my much-needed cabinet space is now used for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Cyberscriber

customer_reviews.title: Anchors aren’t the best
customer_reviews.text: All and all they were easy to install , except that the anchor broke off when I was drilling it in the wall , I was able to use the piece that was left on the wall though... I’m hoping for the best
customer_reviews.author: Francis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very Tough Lil Rack
customer_reviews.text: First rate quality, this is my third one, have plans on 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Works Well....Can Be Added-on To
customer_reviews.text: This works well, and note that it can be added on to with another one of the same length. I think that feature is important.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold my pots as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.text: Still in the box, does not hold my pots like I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes a lot more room n a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bar, does its job of hanging kitchen tools/utensils ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bar, does its job of hanging kitchen tools/utensils (spatulas, etc) on the wall. I didn't mount it using the screws though, i just use heavy duty command strips, and that still worked perfectly well. It's a good length too, not too long but not too short that all the utensils are crowded.
customer_reviews.author: AIR

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Makeover
customer_reviews.text: The color has a great bright and shiny quality and easy to install in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: rik

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to mouth with lots of hooks
customer_reviews.text: Holds all our pots/pans well for our small kitchen. Looks good and easy to mouth with lots of hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Smith

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely Love this rack
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this rack! It comes with the S hooks so I can also fit some utensils between my pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: ladyred

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It's basic and simple but stylish. Easy to install and priced right being that it is stainless steel. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelson Burns

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Skillet Holder
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Will hold 5 cast iron skillets with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Angela West

customer_reviews.title: Great rack!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and beautiful, does a great job keeping everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: R F ANKLESARIA

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges!
customer_reviews.text: Edges were very sharp like a knife. I cut my finger un-packaging it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and attractive. Clean lines. I have two cast iron pans hanging right now and not even a wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as pictures, great quality. only complaint is the screws are not finished to the metal bar itself. But not as big of an issue or noticeable to remove a star. easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat ???? OK
customer_reviews.text: The pole part of the small rack is very nice. My disappointment was that I have not been able to install it because the package came with no screws and the braces that attach to the wall are painted white. I will purchase something to clean off the paint so the set is entirely stainless steel and also some screws. Then I am sure I will enjoy the product. I did not contact the seller. It will be easier to go to the hardware store and get what I need. It did come with 10 s-curve hangers so that was good.
customer_reviews.author: Sprout

customer_reviews.title: Would order again.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It is very sturdy and the color is great. I would give it 5 star, but the reason I am not is because it is a little small. To give you an idea of how big it is, I can fit a medium and very small pot, and 2 large pans. Also, when it arrived, there was some kind of white paint on the silver, but it was easy enough to peal off. Over all, if I had a choice to order again, I definitely would.
customer_reviews.author: Trin-bin

customer_reviews.title: Engineering problem...
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to keep this shelf. It fell down twice from the wall and even then my huband the engineer continued to try to make it stay up! To no avail...it is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

product_meta.title: Stainless Steel Gourmet Kitchen 23.25 Inch Wall Rail Pot Pan Utensil Lid Rack Storage Organizer with 10 S Hooks
product_meta.description:
The Positively Enchanting, Elegant and Unobtrusive Design Can Easily be Modified to Accommodate Any Situation... 

Hanging Utensils: This rail is perfect for hanging whisks, spatulas, utensils, zester, mandolin slicer, measuring cups and spoons. 
Hang everything at your fingertips and keep your drawers free of clutter. 

Multi-Purpose: The wall rod is versatile enough to use for hanging almost anything. 
Utilize it inside your closet and use the rails for hanging accessories, jewelry, cleaning supplies, athletic equipment and gear. 

Get Creative: With this wall mounted iron rail, you can create a perfect art and crafts organizer rack. 
The rail comes with 10 S-hooks to help you hang your supplies or by simply placing a few small containers you can turn the rail into the ultimate organizer. 
The containers can hold your paint brushes, paints, weaving supplies, pens, pencils, scissors, or other school supplies. 

The Gourmet Kitchen Rail Will Help You To: Free up cabinet space, clear the mess sitting on your counter and work more productively. 
Organize with ease, keep pots, pans, lids and utensils within reach, tidy up closets, garage, kitchen or bathroom, chop, cut and cook efficiently. 
This wall rail will make the perfect gift idea for any occasion or holiday, you can make someone happy for a housewarming or bridal shower. 

Specifications: 
Material: Stainless Steel 
Color: Silver 
Rail Dimensions: 23.25” x 3” x 2” Each Hook is 2.75” in Height 

What is in the Package: 
1 23” Gourmet Pot and Pan Rack 10 S-Hooks and Mounting Hardware
feature_bullets: Requires Basic Assembly: The 23.25” x 3” x 2” kitchen rod comes with 10 S shaped hooks and mounting hardware included in the packaging. Utilize it on the unused wall space near or above your stove to practically keep your cooking essentials within easy reach.

Configurable Rod: This rail comes with a connector giving you the flexibility to customize it to your desired length by adding more. Connect more of the same design or smaller size to make it functionally blend with your wall space.

Attractive: The durable kitchen bar comes with heavy gauge stainless steel brackets to hold a sustainable amount of weight. The rack also comes with a protective film, remove the film for a shiny and attractive finish.

Feel Like a Gourmet Cook: Store all your cooking supplies close at hand and save time from sorting through your cookware every time you must cook. You won’t have to dig through your pots and then look for the lids. Hang your cookware and store the lids on top.

Free Up Space: Create room inside your cabinets and tidy up your kitchen counter to work more productively when preparing meals. A cluttered kitchen will prevent you from cooking for yourself and for your family. Keep your mind at your ease and your loved ones happy with tasty fresh meals every day.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
